title: ClickFunnels, Email Marketing + General Support
job_overview:
I’m looking for a tech-savvy and highly organized Virtual Assistant who is experienced in:
 • ClickFunnels (or GoHighLevel)
 • Email marketing (Omnisend, Flodesk, or similar platforms)
 • Backend admin and support for mentorship programs, student management, and general operations

I run a fast-paced 6-figure business in the hair and beauty industry, selling both digital and physical products — and I also run live mentorships and webinars.

I need someone who can handle the tech and the backend, so I can focus on teaching and scaling.

?

Required Skills:
 • Expert in building/editing funnels (ClickFunnels, GoHighLevel, or similar)
 • Email marketing: flows, campaigns, list management, A/B testing
 • Able to set up automations and tags for segmented email lists
 • Good English (for proofreading or lightly editing email copy if needed)
 • Experience managing communities (Skool, Kajabi, or FB groups a bonus)
 • Organised, reliable, and communicates updates daily
 • Bonus: Familiar with Shopify and Zapier integrations

?

Day-to-Day Tasks May Include:
 • Creating opt-in pages, webinar funnels, and thank-you pages
 • Scheduling & updating email campaigns
 • Managing mentees (sending reminders, tracking progress, updating CRM)
 • Uploading content replays and coordinating with my schedule
 • Simple customer service replies (refunds, FAQs, etc.)
 • Helping me stay on top of deadlines and launches

This is a long-term role for someone who wants to grow with the brand. If you’re reliable, solution-focused, and experienced with digital business backends, I want to hear from you.

To apply, please send:
 1. A short message introducing yourself
 2. Examples of ClickFunnels/email work you’ve done
 3. Your availability 

Looking forward to bringing the right person into my team!

Best,
Tay | TaysLuxe Academy
